Events.Text: Use your imagination to generate a conversation about the topics 'checking ride status', 'getting directions', and 'schedule a meeting' (in any order), as shown on the left. You may also ask the assistant about the weather.  [instruction 1 of 6]
Hi my name is Mark. I want to check ride status ID 442.

Events.Text: When are you going to start your trip?

PrimaryItem.RideStatus: Your ride is on its way.

DetailedTransitInstructions: Walk east from your starting location towards the bus stop at Forbes and Murray. You will walk 3 blocks and the stop will be in front of a large brown church.
Take the 61A until the final stop, which will be at Forbes and Craig. It will take approximately 20 minutes and 13 stops.
After you get off the stop, turn right at the Starbucks and walk down Craig St for 2 blocks.
After you pass the Chinese Restaurant (green brick building), your destination will be on the left just before the crosswalk.
TransitInstructions: Walk to the bus stop at Forbes and Murray.
Take the 61A until the last stop.
After you get off the stop, turn left and walk down Craig St for 2 blocks.
Your destination will be on the left.

Events.Text:
Unfortunately John is not able to make Monday @ 2 pm.
Would you like to try scheduling the meeting for a different day or time?
anytime on Monday would be fine.

Ok, once you've touched on all the topics ('checking ride status', 'getting directions', and 'schedule a meeting') and engaged in some smalltalk, you can bring the conversation to a natural close. [instruction 6 of 6]

Thanks. I want to know the weather in San Francisco for Monday.

PrimaryItem.Message: Your meeting has been successfuly scheduled.
Your meeting has been successfuly scheduled.

Events.Text: cloudy
Sorry, don't know how that happened. It will be Cloudy all day on Monday in San Francisco, with temperatures of around 24 degrees celsius.
What about NYC?
sunny
It will be Sunny all day on Monday in New York City, with temperatures of around 29 degrees celsius.

Scenario.UserTask:
Come up with your own scenario!

About you:
- Your name: Mark

 The AI Assistant can handle:
- Check your ride's status (e.g. ride id 442)
- Get walking/driving/transit directions (e.g. from '5th and Main' to 'Hospital') 
- Schedule a meeting
- Checking the weather forecast in different Cities (e.g. San Francisco or New York City)
Scenario.WizardTask: Follow the flow charts and help the user.

UserQuestionnaire.Question: Did the assistant stay calm and helpful throughout the dialogue?

WizardQuestionnaire.Question: Did the user change his/her mind about what he/she wants at any time?
Did the user become aggressive or annoyed during the dialogue? (Note: some users may be instructed to be annoying.)
Where you unsure about what to do at any time? (Feel free to send us an email with details.)
